trans-unit.source: Specifies the internal execution behavior of a durable service contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: 영 속 서비스 계약 구현의 내부 실행 동작을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following items are checked as part of the validation logic for durable services: - All sessionful bindings have a context binding element such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpContextBindingElement> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 영 속 서비스에 대 한 유효성 검사 논리의 일부로 검사 되는 다음 항목:-모든 세션 바인딩에 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpContextBindingElement>또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.NetTcpContextBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WSHttpContextBindingElement> 같은 컨텍스트 바인딩 요소는

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> value must not be set to Multiple.
- The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> value must be PerSession.
- There must be one sessionful endpoint configured for the service.
trans-unit.target: -있어야 서비스용으로 구성 된 세션 끝점 하나가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: - If the contract disallows sessions, then <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A> must be set to `true` for all operations.
trans-unit.target: -계약 다음 세션을 허용 하지 않는 경우 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A>으로 설정 되어 있어야 `true` 모든 작업에 대해.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If the contract permits or allows sessions then all operations for which <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A> is set to `true` must be request/response operations, that is <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A> cannot be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: -경우 계약을 허용 하는지 여부나 세션 다음 된 모든 작업 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A>로 설정 된 `true` 즉 요청/응답 작업 이어야 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A>로 설정할 수 없습니다 `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationInfo.IsOneWay%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableOperationAttribute.CanCreateInstance%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A> is set to `true`, then all operations on the service must either be marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> set to `true` or marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: -If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A>로 설정 되어 `true`, 서비스에서 모든 작업으로 표시 하거나 해야 다음 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName>로 설정 `true` 또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption?displayProperty=fullName> 으로 표시</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute.SaveStateInOperationTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> must be set to Single.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute"></xref> class.
Not implemented in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute"></xref>.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Customizes the service runtime to support durable service behavior properties, such as specifying a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider"></xref> for the service.
trans-unit.target: 지정 하는 등 영 속 서비스 동작 속성을 지원 하도록 서비스 런타임을 사용자 지정는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider"> </xref> 서비스에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service instance state is persisted to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider"></xref> using the same transaction under which the operation is run.
trans-unit.target: 서비스 인스턴스 상태를 유지 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProvider"> </xref> 작업이 실행 되는 동일한 트랜잭션을 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If SaveStateInOperationTransaction is set to `true`, then all operations on the service must either be marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> set to `true` or marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: SaveStateInOperationTransaction로 설정 되어 있으면 `true`, 서비스에서 모든 작업으로 표시 하거나 해야 다음 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName>로 설정 `true` <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionFlowOption?displayProperty=fullName> 으로 표시 또는</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> must be set to Single.
Setting SaveStateInOperationTransaction to `true` makes the service state transactional with the operation transaction.
trans-unit.target: SaveStateInOperationTransaction 설정 `true` 하면 작업 트랜잭션과 함께 서비스 상태도 트랜잭션이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This means that if the operation's transaction rolls back, the service state also rolls back.
trans-unit.target: 즉,이 작업의 트랜잭션이 롤백되면 서비스 상태도 롤백됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service instance state is persisted using the same transaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>서비스 인스턴스 상태가 동일한 트랜잭션을; 사용 하 여 지속 되 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction"></xref> enumeration value associated with the durable service.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction"> </xref> 영 속 서비스와 연결 된 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DurableServiceAttribute> is instantiated, it sets this property value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction>.
This means that whenever an unknown exception is encountered by the durable service, the service instance is terminated and any state information is deleted from the persistence store.
trans-unit.target: 즉, 영 속 서비스에서 알 수 없는 예외가 발생 될 때마다 서비스 인스턴스가 종료 되 고 모든 상태 정보가 지 속성 저장소에서 삭제 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.UnknownExceptionAction"></xref> enumeration value.
Verifies that all durable operations on the service are set up correctly.
trans-unit.target: 서비스의 모든 영 속 작업이 제대로 설정 되어 있는지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.
